mapper.select: select id, content, create_time, ac.user_id, article_id, u.user_id, user_name from article_comment as ac join user as u on ac.user_id = u.user_id and article_id = #{articleId} order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{len};
select id, content, user_id, article_id, create_time from article_comment;

select ac.id, ac.content, ac.create_time,u.user_name from article_comment as ac join user as u on u.user_id=ac.user_id where ac.article_id in (select article_id from article as a where a.user_id=#{userId}) order by create_time DESC limit #{start},#{len};

select ac.id, ac.content,ac.user_id,ac.create_time,a.title from article_comment as ac join article as a on ac.article_id=a.article_id where ac.user_id = #{userId} Order by create_time desc limit #{start},#{len};
select id, ac.content, ac.create_time, u.user_name, title from article_comment as ac join user as u join article as a where id=#{id}
